ns2:test-suite.name: User on his demand should be redirected on the agent

test-case.name: Verify if user is able to communicate with agent by typing "chat to support" into widget

step.title: Then Agent has new conversation request

step.title: When Agent click on new conversation request from touch

step.title: Then Conversation area becomes active with chat to support user's message

step.name: And There is no more than one from user message
step.title: And There is no more than one from user message

step.name: And There is no from agent response added by default for chat to support user message

step.name: Then User have to receive 'hello' text response for his 'chat to support' input
step.title: Then User have to receive 'hello' text response for his 'chat to support' input
